mapper.insert: insert into social_practice (practice_name, practice_type, organizer, start_date, end_date, description, created_time, updated_time) values (#{practiceName}, #{practiceType}, #{organizer}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{description}, now(), now())
mapper.select: select practice_id, practice_name, practice_type, organizer, start_date, end_date from social_practice order by start_date desc
